## Load the libraries
Library list: 

(The packages will be used, except the packages inside the feature engineering functions.)

```{r libraries_list}
library(readr)
library(janitor)
library(assertr)
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(glue)
```

## Load data

Now we can import the dataset and clean the names first.

```{r import data}
USvideos <- read_csv("data/USvideos.csv") %>%
  clean_names()
```
